ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.5"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67659-3" EMS billing Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10080)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Billing Section" (CONF:10907)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10910)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Billing Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.91)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10912)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Level Of Service Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.92)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67659-3" EMS billing Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10080)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Billing Section" (CONF:10907)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:10910)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Billing Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.91)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10912)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Level Of Service Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.92)
